efisiensi_modal.title: Capital Efficiency
efisiensi_modal.content: By using Margin Trading (collateral funds), investors can conduct large transactions with relatively small capital, without needing to use 100% funds (full margin) as in stock market trading.

fleksibilitas_transaksi.title: Transaction Flexibility
fleksibilitas_transaksi.content: Transactions take advantage of two-way trends, allowing investors to get profit opportunities when price trends move up or down.

pergerakan_harga.title: Highly Fluctuating Price Movements
pergerakan_harga.content: Large daily price movements ranging from 100 - 500 points on stock indices, 10 - 20 troy ounces on Loco London gold, and 100 - 150 pips in forex trading will provide great profit opportunities with contract values of US$ 5/point, 100,000 per forex currency, and 100 troy ounces per Loco London gold, and customers are only charged relatively small transaction fees.

likuiditas_tinggi.title: High Liquidity
likuiditas_tinggi.content: This product has very high liquidity, so investors can buy and sell transactions anytime during market hours, supported by an online trading system facility.

tanpa_batasan_waktu.title: No Time Limit for Open Positions
tanpa_batasan_waktu.content: Customers are free to determine how long to transact without any penalties or administrative fees when withdrawing funds or closing accounts.

jenis_investasi.title: Types of Investment
jenis_investasi.content: There are two types of investment:

fixed_rate.title: Fixed Rate / Fixed Exchange Rate
fixed_rate.content:
US$ 1 = Rp. 10,000 (fixed rate)
Avoid risk of loss due to USD/IDR fluctuations

floating_rate.title: Floating Rate / Floating Exchange Rate
floating_rate.content:
US$ 1 = US$ 1 (according to USD/IDR rate)
No fees for opening and withdrawing USD funds partially or fully
